text: 'iina rabakum allah aladhi awjd alsmwat wal'ard fi sitat ayam, thuma astwa -ay eala wartfe- ealaa alearsh astwa' ylyq bjlalh wezmth, yudabir 'umur khlqh, la ydadduh fi qdayh ahd, wala yashfae eindah shafe yawm alqiamat 'iilaa min baed 'an yadhan lah balshfaet, faebuduu allah rabakum almtsf bhdhh alsfat, wa'akhlasuu lah alebad. 'afala ttezwn wtetbrwn bhdhh alayat walhjj?
